isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - CYLINDER HEAD GASKET, REPLACE (RIGHT SIDE)

wtsproc.config: Right side viewed as sitting in driver's seat looking forward.

step1.para: Chock wheels.
Disconnect battery.
Remove both belly pan center sections for access to exhaust pipe.
Drain cooling system.
Disconnect IAT sensor. Remove complete air filter assembly to include air inlet pipe / hose at turbocharger.

Drain air tanks. Disconnect serpentine belt from air compressor. Disconnect all air, oil and coolant lines / hoses necessary to remove air compressor. Remove air compressor with support bracket attached.
Remove both charge air cooler pipes / hoses. Cover openings.
Remove air intake y-pipe from turbocharger. Cover openings.
Syphon high pressure oil pump reservoir of oil.
Disconnect fuel supply and return lines from fuel filter assembly. Secure out of way.
Remove power steering hose support bracket from valve cover. Remove power steering pump from high pressure oil pump reservoir. Secure pump out of way.

note.para: Do not open power steering system.

step1.para: Disconnect oil pressure line at high pressure oil pump reservoir. Secure out of way.
Disconnect all wiring harnesses attached to valve cover and cylinder head, to include glow plug relay and chassis connection with support brackets attached. Secure out of way.
Remove crankcase breather tube from valve cover and cylinder head.
Remove high pressure oil rail end plug from rear of cylinder head. Catch oil in container.
Remove valve cover. Disconnect wiring to valve cover gasket. Remove valve cover gasket.
Remove both glow plug / injector wiring harnesses.
Remove all rocker arm assemblies and push rods.
Remove all fuel injectors. Remove fuel injector shoulder bolts.
Remove all glow plugs.
Remove exhaust pipe from exhaust manifold and exhaust turbo inlet adapter.

note.para: To ease removal, push exhaust pipe up into exhaust inlet adapter. Rotate pipe to gain clearance from manifold. Remove pipe.

step1.para: Remove high pressure oil line from cylinder head, include support clamp at air intake cover. Remove fuel line from cylinder head and fuel filter assembly.
Remove cylinder head bolts.
Install lifting eye and lifting device to cylinder head.
Remove cylinder head. Remove cylinder head gasket.
Clean all parts and mating surfaces.
Inspect cylinder head for warpage, cracks or valve leakage.
Replace all fuel injector seals.
Install new head gasket. Install cylinder head. Remove lifting device and lifting eye.
Lightly lubricate cylinder head bolts with clean engine oil on threads and under flange head. Install head bolts, torque in sequence and to spec.
Install high pressure oil line to cylinder head, include support clamp. Install fuel line to cylinder head and fuel filter assembly.
Install exhaust pipe to manifold and exhaust inlet adapter. Apply "never-seez" to exhaust tube flange bolts. Torque to spec.
Apply "never-seez" to glow plug threads. Install glow plugs. Torque to spec.
Install fuel injector shoulder bolts. Torque to spec.
Lubricate fuel injector seals with clean engine oil. Install fuel injectors. Torque bolts to spec.
Install push rods with copper color ball end up. Lubricate rocker arm assemblies with clean engine oil. Torque bolts to spec.
Install both glow plug / injector harnesses.
Install valve cover gasket. Connect wiring to valve cover gasket.
Install valve cover. Tighten in sequence and torque to spec.
Install high pressure oil rail end plug to rear of cylinder head. Torque to spec.
Install crankcase breather tube to valve cover and cylinder head.
Connect all wire harnesses to valve cover and cylinder head, to include glow plug relay and chassis connection with support brackets.
Connect oil pressure line to high pressure oil pump reservoir.
Install power steering pump to high pressure oil pump reservoir. Torque nuts to spec. Connect power steering hose support bracket to valve cover.
Connect fuel supply and return lines to fuel filter assembly.
Install air intake y-pipe.

note.para: Lubricate turbocharger air outlet O-ring with clean engine oil.

step1.para: Install both charge air cooler pipes / hoses.
Install air compressor with support bracket. Connect air, oil and coolant lines / hoses to air compressor. Connect serpentine belt to air compressor.
Install complete air filter assembly, to include air inlet pipe / hose at turbocharger. Connect IAT sensor.
Fill cooling system.
Change engine oil and oil filter.
Connect battery.
Start vehicle and check for leaks.
Check and top off engine fluids as needed.
Install both belly pan sections.
Remove wheel chocks.
Road test vehicle.
